patthana7.17:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
patthana7.17:0.3_0: he has laid down a filthy talk.
patthana7.17:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, conditioned bydependently originated phenomena.
patthana7.17:1.1_1: The arising of thought doesn’t arise dependent on the arising of thought.
patthana7.17:1.1_2: doesn’t arise dependent on the arising and vanishing.
patthana7.17:2.1_0: Perception arises dependent on the arising of thought.
patthana7.17:2.1_2: dependently originated phenomena don’t arise because of the arising.
patthana7.17:3.1_0: Neither dependently originated phenomena as a cause.
patthana7.17:3.1_1: Neither dependently originated phenomena as the arising of thought.
patthana7.17:3.1_2: doesn’t arise dependent on the arising and passing away.
